tasks.label: Run act tests
tasks.command: act -j tests --input pre-build="sudo apt update -y && sudo apt install -y qt6-base-dev" --input args=-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug

tasks.label: Run act x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc
tasks.command: act --artifact-server-path build -j x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc --input pre-build="sudo apt update -y && sudo apt install -y '^libxcb.*-dev' libglu1-mesa-dev libx11-xcb-dev libxi-dev libxkbcommon-dev libxkbcommon-x11-dev libxrender-dev ninja-build" --input args=-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release --input upload-artifact=true

tasks.label: Run act x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc
tasks.command: act --artifact-server-path build -j x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc --input pre-build="sudo apt update -y && sudo apt install -y mingw-w64 ninja-build && sudo pip install aqtinstall --break-system-packages" --input args="-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=CMakeModules/cmake/toolchain-x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc.cmake" --input upload-artifact=true
